headline: Was Jim Cramer Right About Walgreens Boots Alliance (WBA)?
summary: We recently published a list of Was Jim Cramer Right About These 23 Stocks?. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Walgreens Boots Alliance, Inc. (NASDAQ:WBA) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discussed 12 months ago. During the latest episode of Mad Money, Jim Cramer advised his viewers to […]
